hints.content:
Let's use a place value chart to write eighteen thousand, thirty-nine in standard form.

Ten Thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens |  Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:
$\goldD1$ | $\tealD8$ | $0$ | $\purpleD3$ | $\greenD9$

Now, let's use a place value chart to write $18{,}039$ in expanded form.

Ten Thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens |  Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:
$\goldD1$ | $\tealD8$ | $0$ | $\purpleD3$ | $\greenD9$

$18{,}039=\goldD{10{,}000}+\tealD{8{,}000}+\purpleD{30}+\greenD{9}$

This is the completed chart:

Standard Form | Word Form | Expanded Form
- | - | -
$18{,}039$ | Eighteen thousand, thirty-nine | ${10{,}000}+{8{,}000}+{30}+9$

question.content:
**Complete the chart so all three forms equal the same number.**

Standard Form | Word Form | Expanded Form
- | - | -
[[☃ dropdown 2]] | Eighteen thousand, thirty-nine| [[☃ dropdown 1]]
